oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gnesi, Stefania
Fantechi, Alessandro
Heymans, Patrick
Rubin, Julia
Czarnecki, Krzysztof

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Software Product Line
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/D.2 SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Welcome to SPLC 2014, the 18th International Software Product Line Conference. SPLC is the premier forum for practitioners and researchers to present and discuss novel ideas, research results, experiences as well as issues and problems in the field. This year, the program of the conference consists of a variety of exciting events such as keynote talks, research and industry paper presentations, panels, tutorials, workshops, tool presentations, demos, the doctoral symposium and the Product Line Hall of Fame sessions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: In: Proceedings of the 18th International Software Product Line Conference. Editorial, vol. 1 pp. vii - viii. ACM, 2014.
